description.zh-cn: 香港男歌手、演员，1990年代香港乐坛“四大天王”之一，亦为动感艺人的代表之一。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer, dancer, and actor. Active since the 1980s, he is considered one of the 'Four Heavenly Kings' of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 中国内地女模特，郭富城的妻子。
description.en: A Chinese model, wife of Aaron Kwok.

description.zh-cn: 郭富城与方媛的长女。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Aaron Kwok and Moka Fang.

description.zh-cn: 郭富城与方媛的二女儿。
description.en: The second daughter of Aaron Kwok and Moka Fang.

description.zh-cn: 郭富城的父亲。
description.en: Father of Aaron Kwok.

description.zh-cn: 郭富城的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Aaron Kwok.

description.zh-cn: 郭富城的独家经理人，自1993年起合作至今。
description.en: Aaron Kwok's exclusive manager since 1993.

description.zh-cn: 香港女演员、模特，曾与郭富城有过一段长达七年的恋情。
description.en: A Hong Kong actress and model, who was in a seven-year relationship with Aaron Kwok.

description.zh-cn: 香港摇滚乐队Beyond的灵魂人物，据称与郭富城是好友。
description.en: The lead vocalist of the Hong Kong rock band Beyond, reportedly a good friend of Aaron Kwok.

description.zh-cn: 时任电视广播有限公司艺人经理，曾将郭富城介绍至艺员训练班。
description.en: Former artist manager at Television Broadcasts Limited (TVB) who introduced Aaron Kwok to the artist training program.

description.zh-cn: 台湾知名经理人，在郭富城因机车广告走红后赏识他并将其签下。
description.en: A well-known Taiwanese manager who recognized Aaron Kwok's potential after his popular motorcycle commercial and signed him.

description.zh-cn: 美国歌手，曾于1999年与郭富城合作拍摄百事可乐广告。
description.en: An American singer who collaborated with Aaron Kwok on a Pepsi commercial in 1999.

description.zh-cn: 郭富城曾就读的学校之一。
description.en: One of the schools Aaron Kwok attended.

nodes.id: 伊斯兰脱维善纪念中学

zh-cn: 伊斯兰脱维善纪念中学

description.zh-cn: 郭富城曾就读的学校之一。
description.en: One of the schools Aaron Kwok attended.

description.zh-cn: 郭富城曾就读的学校之一。
description.en: One of the schools Aaron Kwok attended.

description.zh-cn: 香港的免费电视台。郭富城于1984年加入其舞蹈组，后成为艺员，并于1996年离开。
description.en: A free-to-air television broadcaster in Hong Kong. Aaron Kwok joined its dance troupe in 1984, later became an actor, and left in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 1990年代香港乐坛四位最受欢迎男歌手的统称，成员包括张学友、刘德华、黎明和郭富城。
description.en: A media-coined term for the four most popular male Cantopop singers in the 1990s: Jacky Cheung, Andy Lau, Leon Lai, and Aaron Kwok.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的唱片公司，郭富城于1990年至1993年间签约该公司。
description.en: A Taiwanese record label to which Aaron Kwok was signed from 1990 to 1993.

description.zh-cn: 香港的唱片公司，郭富城于1991年至1993年间签约该公司。
description.en: A Hong Kong record label to which Aaron Kwok was signed from 1991 to 1993.

description.zh-cn: 香港的唱片公司，郭富城于1993年至2006年间签约该公司。
description.en: A Hong Kong record label to which Aaron Kwok was signed from 1993 to 2006.

description.zh-cn: 香港的唱片及经理人公司，郭富城于2006年至2020年间签约该公司。
description.en: A Hong Kong record label and management company to which Aaron Kwok was signed from 2006 to 2020.

description.zh-cn: 由郭富城的经理人小美（梁美薇）于1993年成立的经理人公司。
description.en: A management company founded in 1993 by Aaron Kwok's manager, Siu Mei (Leung Mei-mei).

nodes.id: 郭富城国际慈善基金会

zh-cn: 郭富城国际慈善基金会

description.zh-cn: 由郭富城于2000年成立的慈善基金会。
description.en: A charitable foundation established by Aaron Kwok in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 联合国下属机构，致力于维护儿童权利。
description.en: A United Nations agency responsible for providing humanitarian and developmental aid to children worldwide.

nodes.id: 无线电视舞蹈艺员训练班

zh-cn: 无线电视舞蹈艺员训练班

description.zh-cn: 无线电视为培养舞蹈艺员而设立的训练课程。
description.en: A training program established by TVB to cultivate dance artists.

description.zh-cn: 无线电视为培养艺员而设立的训练课程。
description.en: A training program established by TVB to cultivate performing artists.

description.zh-cn: 1841年至1997年期间由英国统治的香港，是郭富城的出生地。
description.en: Hong Kong under British rule from 1841 to 1997, the birthplace of Aaron Kwok.

description.zh-cn: 郭富城与方媛于2017年4月18日在香港半岛酒店举行婚宴。
description.en: Aaron Kwok and Moka Fang held their wedding banquet at The Peninsula Hong Kong on April 18, 2017.

description.zh-cn: 郭咏希是郭富城的长女。
description.en: Chantelle Kwok is the eldest daughter of Aaron Kwok.

description.zh-cn: 郭咏希是方媛的长女。
description.en: Chantelle Kwok is the eldest daughter of Moka Fang.

description.zh-cn: 郭泳萱是郭富城的二女儿。
description.en: Charlotte Kwok is the second daughter of Aaron Kwok.

description.zh-cn: 郭泳萱是方媛的二女儿。
description.en: Charlotte Kwok is the second daughter of Moka Fang.

description.zh-cn: 郭富城是郭志的儿子。
description.en: Aaron Kwok is the son of Kwok Chi.

description.zh-cn: 郭富城是卓信的儿子。
description.en: Aaron Kwok is the son of Cheuk Shun.

description.zh-cn: 郭富城与熊黛林曾有过一段长达七年的恋情。
description.en: Aaron Kwok and Lynn Hung were in a relationship for seven years.

description.zh-cn: 据称郭富城与Beyond乐队的黄家驹是好友，并曾为参加其告别式而取消演唱会。
description.en: Aaron Kwok was reportedly a good friend of Wong Ka Kui from the band Beyond and cancelled a concert to attend his funeral.

relationships.target: 伊斯兰脱维善纪念中学
无线电视舞蹈艺员训练班

description.zh-cn: 时任无线电视艺人经理的冯美基将郭富城介绍至1987年的艺员训练班。
description.en: As the artist manager at TVB, Fung Mei-kei introduced Aaron Kwok to the artist training class in 1987.

description.zh-cn: 在郭富城因台湾机车广告走红后，经理人刘玮慈赏识他并与他签约，开启其在台湾的演艺事业。
description.en: After Aaron Kwok gained popularity from a motorcycle commercial in Taiwan, manager Liu Wei-ci recognized his talent, signed him, and launched his career in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 自1993年至今，梁美薇（小美）是郭富城的独家经理人。
description.en: Since 1993, Leung Mei-mei (Siu Mei) has been Aaron Kwok's exclusive manager.

description.zh-cn: 1992年，郭富城与张学友、刘德华、黎明一同被香港电台晋封为“四大天王”。
description.en: In 1992, Aaron Kwok, along with Jacky Cheung, Andy Lau, and Leon Lai, was named one of the 'Four Heavenly Kings' by Radio Television Hong Kong.

relationships.target: 郭富城国际慈善基金会

position.zh-cn: 东亚及太平洋地区大使
position.en: East Asia and Pacific Regional Ambassador

description.zh-cn: 郭富城与珍妮·杰克逊于1999年合作拍摄百事可乐广告宣传片。
description.en: Aaron Kwok collaborated with Janet Jackson in 1999 to film a promotional commercial for Pepsi.
